articles.description: The locally assembled Jeep Wrangler is priced at Rs. 53.90 lakh (introductory price, ex-showroom). The 5-seater off-roader now comes to India as a semi-knocked down (SKD) unit instead of a completely built unit (CBU).
articles.content: Jeep India has finally launched the locally assembled Jeep Wrangler in India. The made-in India model of the Wrangler is aggressively priced at ₹ 53.90 lakh (ex-showroom). The 5-seater off-roader now… [+3026 chars]

articles.author: Suvil Susvirkar
articles.title: Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R BS6: Top 5 Highlights - BikeWale
articles.description: Kawasaki India has announced the launch of the 2021 Ninja ZX-10R that will rival the likes of Ducati Panigale V4, BMW S1000RR, Suzuki GSX-R1000R and the Yamaha YZF-R1. Here we list the top five highlights of the 2021 Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R BS6.
articles.content: Kawasaki India has announced the launch of the 2021 Ninja ZX-10R that will rival the likes of Ducati Panigale V4, BMW S1000RR, Suzuki GSX-R1000R, and the Yamaha YZF-R1. The updated model features a s… [+2466 chars]

articles.author: Swansy Afonso and Rahul Satija | Bloomberg
articles.title: Billionaire Anil Agarwal sweetens offer for Vedanta Ltd shares by 47% - Business Standard
articles.description: London-based Vedanta Resources Ltd. will now seek to buy 17.51% of Mumbai-listed Vedanta Ltd. at 235 rupees ($3.24) a share, it said in an exchange filing
articles.content:
Anil Agarwal, billionaire founder of the Vedanta Group, has pledged his stake in a cash-rich Indian unit to help sweeten terms for a takeover attempt that’s key to his debt-repayment plans.
